testcase.name: Validate desktop file
testcase.system-out: data/io.boite.imagine.desktop: hint: value "GTK;" for key "Categories" in group "Desktop Entry" does not contain a registered main category; application might only show up in a "catch-all" section of the application menu

testcase.name: Validate appstream file
testcase.system-out: data/io.boite.imagine.appdata.xml: FAILED: • tag-missing : <content_rating> required [use https://odrs.gnome.org/oars] • style-invalid : Not enough <screenshot> tags, minimum is 1 • tag-missing : <release> required • tag-missing : <name> is not present • tag-missing : <summary> is not present • tag-missing : <description> required • tag-missing : <url> is not present
